svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Share of men who are smoking by level of prosperity, 2015
Men 15 and over who smoke any form of tobacco, including cigarettes, cigars, pipes or any other smoked
tobaccoproducts.Data include daily and non-daily or occasional smoking.
